item.title: "Gadwal SP Warns Against Online Betting and Gaming: Strict Action to Be Taken Against Offenders"
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal : District Superintendent of Police (SP) T. Srinivas Rao, IPS, has issued a strong warning against online betting and gaming, urging youth and students to stay away from such addictive and illegal activities. The SP emphasized that those who indulge in online betting, play games on illegal gaming apps, or promote them through social media will face strict legal action.
The increasing trend of online betting and gaming addiction among young people has led to severe financial losses, debts...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
